news_header: Non-alcoholic beverage sales rise as alcoholic beverage sales decline.
news_text: According to the Association of Panimo and soft drinks, while sales of beers, ciders, and mild alcoholic beverages decreased between July and September, non-alcoholic beverage sales saw a significant increase. Specifically, cider sales fell by 5.7%, mild alcoholic beverages by 7.2%, while soft drink sales rose by 5.9% and mineral water sales by 9.2%.
